translations: n.看更人或警察的木棒；警棍

sentences.sentence: Hundreds of police waded into the crowd with nightsticks, as their targets threw rocks, shouted curses, or ran.
sentences.translation: 数百名警察决然地用警察棍向公园中的群众开始攻击，受攻击的群众则开始投掷石块、高声辱骂或干脆逃跑。

sentences.sentence: Police grabbed some members of the group and pounded them in the head with nightsticks before putting them on buses; it was not immediately known if Gulyayev was among those taken away.
sentences.translation: 警察抓走了队伍中的一些成员，并在把他们塞进巴士前用警棍重击他们的头部，但是现在不知道Gulyayev是否在那些被带走的人之中。
